documentation.title: Enqueued Resources
documentation.standard: Scripts must be registered/enqueued via wp_enqueue_script().

code.title: Valid: Script registered and enqueued correctly.
Invalid: Script is directly embedded in HTML.

documentation.standard: Stylesheets must be registered/enqueued via wp_enqueue_style().

code.title: Valid: Stylesheet registered and enqueued correctly.
Invalid: Stylesheet is directly embedded in HTML.
